name: adjunct_suma_fs_mask_and_qc
author: AFNI Developers
description: Script for quickly making some QC images for the SUMA/ directory created by @SUMA_Make_Spec_FS after running FreeSurfer's recon-all.

inputs.description: Do not remove temporary working subdirectory (default: remove it)
inputs.name: No Clean

output-files.description: Whole brain mask based on the FS parcellation created by this script.
output-files.name: FS Parcellation Whole Brain Mask

output-files.description: QC image with overlay of brainmask.nii* volume in red and parcellated subset in black.
output-files.name: QC Image 00

output-files.description: QC image with overlay of fs_parc_wb_mask.nii.gz.
output-files.name: QC Image 01

output-files.description: QC image with overlay of tissue segmentations.
output-files.name: QC Image 02

output-files.description: QC image with overlay of GM.
output-files.name: QC Image 03

output-files.description: QC image with overlay of WM.
output-files.name: QC Image 04

output-files.description: QC image with overlay of "2000" atlas parcellation.
output-files.name: QC Image 05
